title: FS T206 Graded and Raw**New HOF & Move 'em Pricing!!**
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: FS T206 Graded and Raw**New HOF & Move 'em Pricing!!**
posts.post_content:
Narrowing my collection focus and selling off some T206's. Open to offers, especially if purchasing multiple cards. "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

All prices include shipping. PPFF preferred.

Otto Knabe - Sweet Caporal 350/F25 PSA 1.5 - $45 $old
Mickey Doolan (Batting) - EPDG SGC 2 - 175.00 Now $150
Ed Abbaticchio (Brown sleeves) - Piedmont 350 - Poor - $30 Now $25
Jack Stahl (Glove shows) Sweet Caporal 350-460/F42 OP - Trimmed $old
Fielder Jones (Hands at Hips) - Sweet Caporal 150/F30 VG - $old
F. Smith - Sweet Caporal 150/F30 F/G - $old
John McGraw (Finger in Air) - Piedmont 150 SGC 1.5 - $old

Please PM if interested.


Thanks for looking!
Bump for price updates and 3 new cards.
Bump for a new HOFer and price drops.

I'll take Knabe

Sent from my SC-02H using Tapatalk

Also I'll take Stahl.

Knabe, McGraw, Smith and Jones are sold.
